name: Attuned_Salvo_B
display_help: Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
